name: Deploy to Azure VM

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # Trigger deployment on changes to the main branch

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Docker
      uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2

    - name: Build Docker image
      run: docker build -t evan-app .

    - name: Deploy to Azure VM
      run: |
        echo "${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa
        chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
        scp -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa ./Dockerfile <vm-user>@<vm-public-ip>:~/app/
        ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa <vm-user>@<vm-public-ip> "
          docker stop evan || true &&
          docker rm evan || true &&
          docker build -t evan-app ~/app/ &&
          docker run -d -p 5000:5000 --name evan evan-app
        "
